["20:56,720","20:59,720","\"But if you had to, if someone put a gun to your head,\""]
["20:59,720","21:02,720","\"if someone did a bunch of math and then put a gun to your head,\""]
["21:02,720","21:04,720","\"Someone put a meth to your mouth. What would you do?\""]
["21:04,720","21:08,420","\"Would you lose all your teeth and pick off your skin?\""]
["21:08,420","21:11,520","\"Yeah, would you freeze a time and look at that guy?\""]
["21:11,520","21:16,560","\"Yeah, I know. I'd move to a rural New Hampshire and I just keep doing it.\""]
